name: DeSchool
introduce: DeSchool is a learning platform for the crypto industry, serving DAOs, learners and project parties in the whole Web3 world. The goal is to explore the education mechanism in the Web3 era. PoSK (Proof of Skills） is one of the most unique feature of DeSchool. This kind of soul-bounded token (sBt) will be available to mint for Ethereum account once users have finished a course on DeSchool. DeSchool is incubated by SeeDAO.
